it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal
Class CardGridArrayAdapter

java.lang.Object
  android.widget.BaseAdapter
      android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Card>
          it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal.base.BaseCardArrayAdapter
              it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal.CardGridArrayAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter 
public class CardGridArrayAdapter
extends BaseCardArrayAdapter

Array Adapter for Card model. Use it with a CardGridView.

Usage: 

     ArrayList
      cards = new ArrayList
         ();
             for (int i=0;i<1000;i++){
             CardExample card = new CardExample(getActivity(),"My title "+i,"Inner text "+i);
             cards.add(card);
             }
             

             CardGridArrayAdapter mCardArrayAdapter = new CardGridArrayAdapter(getActivity(),cards);
             

             CardGridView gridView = (CardGridView) getActivity().findViewById(R.id.gridId);
             gridView.setAdapter(mCardArrayAdapter); *
It provides a default layout id for each row @layout/list_card_layout Use can easily customize it using card:list_card_layout_resourceID attr in your xml layout:
or: 

     adapter.setRowLayoutId(list_card_layout_resourceID);
